name: Mission II
overview: The security of the universe is in danger! Some evils placed several bombs in different systems. It's your task is to collect all the bombs and to make them inactive. You have only limited time until the bombs will explode! Another one with shifty gravity. Watch those walls... too late... BOOM! Published in 64'er 1990/11, 64'er Sonderheft 73, 64'er 1998/08, SYS PD Diskett#49 (1994).
